physical_findings: Altered mental status (ranging from confusion to coma)

lab_values.hepatitis_a_virus: Positive serology for Hepatitis A virus

risk_factors: Exposure to fecal matter from an infected individual
Travel to areas with high rates of Hepatitis A
Men who have sex with men
Pre-existing liver disease (e.g., Hepatitis B, Hepatitis C, HIV)

imaging_findings.CT_scan: May show hepatomegaly, ascites, and other complications

required: Clinical presentation consistent with hepatic coma
Positive serology for Hepatitis A virus
supportive: Imaging findings consistent with liver disease
History of exposure to Hepatitis A virus

differential_diagnoses: Other causes of hepatic encephalopathy (e.g., liver failure from other causes, drug-induced hepatic injury)
Other causes of coma (e.g., stroke, brain injury, metabolic disorders)
